sections.heading: How to Visit Bentota Beach on a Budget
paragraphs: Experience the golden sands and sparkling waters of Bentota, Sri Lanka. Relax under swaying palms, try thrilling water sports, and enjoy a peaceful tropical escape. Perfect for a budget-friendly beach getaway.
Bentota is one of Sri Lanka's most famous beach destinations. Whether you're looking for adventure, relaxation, or cultural experiences, this charming coastal town has something for everyone.

sections.heading: Things to Do in Bentota
list: Relax on Bentota Beach and watch the sunset
Try water sports like jet skiing, windsurfing, and snorkeling
Visit the Brief Garden and explore tropical gardens
Take a river safari on the Bentota River

sections.heading: Travel Tips
paragraphs: The best time to visit Bentota is from December to April, during the dry season. Bring sunscreen, light clothing, swimwear, and local currency. Public transport and tuk-tuks are convenient for short trips, but renting a scooter can give you more freedom to explore.

sections.heading: Nearby Attractions
paragraphs: Aside from the beach, don't miss the Kosgoda Turtle Hatchery, the Madu River boat tours, and the historic temples nearby. Each location offers a unique slice of Sri Lankan culture and nature.
